title: ARAM noob
body: Hey guys. I have only just started playiing aram and i was hoping that someone could please tell me the purpose of the sheep things. I find players getting surrounded by them, especially when playing lux. I dont understand what they do. i have google it but i still dont fully understand their purpose.

replies.body:
Not sure if serious?

Good bait

> [{quoted}](name=TouchMyKimchi,realm=OCE,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=tjKERKlu,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2015-05-17T03:22:30.312+0000)
>
> Not sure if serious?
> 
> Good bait

Idk i might be drunk
I think if you play braum and use the dragonslayer skin they get moustaches
they dont rly have a purpose theyre kinda just there

Cute little Poros, you have a Poro Cookie in place of your Trinket Slot and when you're near a Poro, Press the Trinket Key ("4" Key in most cases) and you'll give the cute little Poro a cookie.

DON'T FORGET TO CLEAN UP THE DROPPINGS!
They are poros, they make the world fluffier.
